column5: Scotlandis a country that is part of the United Kingdom and covers the northern third of the island of Great Britain.#Newline            It shares a border with England to the south#Comma and is otherwise surrounded by the Atlantic Ocean#Comma with the North Sea#Newline            to the east and the North Channel and Irish Sea to the south-west.#Newline            In addition to the mainland#Comma the country is made up of more than 790 islands#Commaincluding the Northern Isles and the Hebrides.
